page.title: 17Transport in Itchenor area
page.content: Since there are no shops in this area transport is vital. However the bus service to and from Itchenor village only runs once on Tuesday mornings and twice on Saturday in the morning and just after noon. Along the main road to W.Wittering the buses run once every hour in each direction, though on Sundays only every two hours. State school children are provided for by school buses. The nearest railway station is at Chichester. Since public transport is so meagre, nearly every household in the area has at least one car.
